title: How to write a letter to your friend requesting him to spend summer vacation with you - Quora

response.answer_text: (Your full address) in right side My dear friends,( friends name) I hope this letter finds you in the best of your health and happiness .on the 17 October 2018 ,I am going to visit the national art museum my town i had planned nothing for the Tuesday 17 October 2018 . The building of this Museum is very nice to look at. I went inside the museum hall. There I saw many thing of our past. They all are the broken parts of our famous temple and forts. Dear friends, now you can make an idea of our museum. please come in the coming holiday ,so that we will together go their to visit ourstate museum.
